body_html:
Another comment is puzzling for a novice that wants to know more:

# Note: We keep computing zs after they diverge! This
#       is very wasteful! There are better, if a little
#       less simple, ways to do this.

Is there some tutorial or a more specific reference how do it better?
body_text:
Another comment is puzzling for a novice that wants to know more:
# Note: We keep computing zs after they diverge! This
#       is very wasteful! There are better, if a little
#       less simple, ways to do this.

Is there some tutorial or a more specific reference how do it better?
body:
Another comment is puzzling for a novice that wants to know more:
```
# Note: We keep computing zs after they diverge! This
#       is very wasteful! There are better, if a little
#       less simple, ways to do this.
```
Is there some tutorial or a more specific reference how do it better?
